nodes.text: Borna Lys was a female Twi'lek who lived on Nar Shaddaa some five years after the Jedi Civil War; she was met by Meetra Surik when the former Jedi General was traveling on the Smugglers' Moon. A swoop racing enthusiast, she sought to thwart the current champion. With the help of Surik she was able to take the lead of the swoop business, left to her by Lupo Shar after the self-destruction of C9-T9-GE3.
